channel.title: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/2vil9x1.gif[/img]
The surrounding area.
Like always, I plan on making a city, however, this city is a fair distance away (halfway takes 30 minutes on foot.) So I'm posting this just to get the thread in.
By the way, I like wooden buildings.

item.title: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Frell:

why cant you just build mark blocks as unbreakable with a custom tool

Because that would cause worse griefing, kiddies places unbreakable blocks in your door ways and shit or just like reyx said, encasing your house in the stuff so you cant get in or out.

Read full topic
item.source: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]

item.title: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I’ll update whenever there is a recommended build for 1.5, there are a few ‘stable’ builds so far, but each has its fair share of bugs.

Read full topic
item.source: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]

item.title: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:22, topic:392022”][quote author=LilXCj link=topic=489186.msg3576614#msg3576614 date=1303479190]

Lightning is going to start a fire and burn it all down!

THIS.

Wood houses, although they are my preferred ones, will fail. Unless you build a stone covering over the top.

I was planning on making a fireproof roof before we switched to 1.5
[/quote]

Hehe, well you better get on it since we should be updating very, very soon.[/quote]
Like today?

Read full topic

item.title: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:20, topic:392022”]He should make it like gmod where when you look at an object (or block in this case) it shows the owners name. And once you ban the griefer have all their blocks auto deleted.

good point though rey[/quote]

That’s pretty smart.

Read full topic

item.source: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]

item.title: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

What the fuck are you on about? That was a serious comment, minecraft has been out for a long time and everyone is aware of griefing being a problem. Notch can easily allow grief protection to be enabled to make your home blocks unbreakable but he wont. All you get are little logs.

Read full topic

item.title: A new project - [ Stage one: Establishing a base of operations ]
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Frell:

yet make a forum thread telling people to come live there

It makes it easier to single out players, making sure a griefer doesn’t stumble upon your area, allowing you to play with friends or people you trust.

Read full topic
